sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROVIGO a city of Austrian Italy, in the province of Milan, and the capital of the delegation of Polesina. It is situated on the river Adigetto, over which are four bridges, by which it is connected with its suburbs. It is fortified, and is ' the seat of the bishop of Adria, who has a palace and an ecclesiastical seminary, and twenty-six churches, under his care. It contains 1200 houses, with 6950 inhabitants, who are chiefly employed in making leather and in refining saltpetre. Long. 11. 42. 43. E. Lat. 45. 3. 57. N.
